pkgmetadata.longdescription: Post-Translational Modification Enrichment, Integration, and Matching Analysis // Functions and mined database from 'UniProt' focusing on post-translational modifications to do single enrichment analysis (SEA) and protein set enrichment analysis (PSEA). Payman Nickchi, Uladzislau Vadadokhau, Mehdi Mirzaie, Marc Baumann, Amir Ata Saei, Mohieddin Jafari (2025) doi:10.1002/pmic.202400238.
